effect_entries.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Lowers the target's Defense by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Lowers the target's Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This
also lowers the target’s Defense stat.
